quote: Never before had he seen a woman so angry—or so seductive. It rendered him speechless. He couldn’t fight the compulsion to kiss her.She punched him on the chin, snapping his head back.
quote_letters: NEVER BEFORE HAD HE SEEN A WOMAN SO ANGRY-OR SO SEDUCTIVE IT RENDERED HIM SPEECHLESS HE COULDNT FIGHT THE COMPULSION TO KISS HERSHE PUNCHED HIM ON THE CHIN SNAPPING HIS HEAD BACK
